job.title: Experienced C#/.NET Backend Developer with Angular Experience
job.description:
We need an experienced C#/.NET backend developer to fix urgent issues in our video streaming yoga application.

This job is all about quickly solving issues and to upgrade Angular version to 16. Currently we are using Angular 12.

Skills Required:
- Proficiency in JavaScript and Angular 12/16.
- Experience with handling file uploads to S3 and processing, specifically CSV formats.
- Familiarity with the latest trends and best practices in JavaScript development.
- Strong understanding of version control Github and git flow.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Willingness to work on Android and iOS apps

questions.question: Describe your recent experience with similar projects

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are seeking an experienced C#/.NET Backend Developer with Angular experience for a short-term project. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in .NET Core, SQL, .NET Framework, AngularJS, ASP.NET, Microsoft SQL Server, JavaScript, Angular, C#, and ASP.NET MVC.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain backend applications using C# and .NET technologies
- Collaborate with the frontend development team to integrate backend functionality
- Design and implement efficient database structures using SQL and Microsoft SQL Server
- Write clean, reusable, and maintainable code
- Troubleshoot and resolve any backend-related issues

To apply, please submit a detailed proposal outlining your relevant experience and how you can contribute to this project. Additionally, include links to past completed projects that demonstrate your proficiency in C#/.NET backend development with Angular.

We look forward to reviewing your proposal and finding the best candidate for this project.
